description: Manage the query of log analytics query pack.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query create
commands.summary: Create a specific query within a log analytics query pack.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query create --body
                                                 --display-name
                                                 --name
                                                 --query-pack-name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 [--categories]
                                                 [--description]
                                                 [--resource-types]
                                                 [--solutions]
                                                 [--tags]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query create --query-id 112c6b1f-5a86-4f01-a2d7-efb8e31f930f --display-name queryName -g resourceGroupName  --query-pack-name queryPackName --body "heartbeat | take 10" --description "some description" --categories "[network,monitor]" --resource-types "[microsoft.network/loadbalancers,microsoft.insights/autoscalesettings]" --solutions "[networkmonitoring]" --tags "{version:[v2022-01-01,v2021-12-01]}"

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query delete
commands.summary: Delete a specific query defined within a log analytics query pack.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query delete [--ids]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--query-pack-name]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--yes]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query delete --query-id 112c6b1f-5a86-4f01-a2d7-efb8e31f930f -g resourceGroup --query-pack-name queryPackName

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query list
commands.summary: List queries defined within a log analytics query pack.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query list --query-pack-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--include-body {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query list -g resourceGroupName --query-pack-name queryPackName
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query list -g resourceGroupName --query-pack-name queryPackName --include-body false

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query search
commands.summary: Search a list of queries defined within a log analytics query pack according to given search properties.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query search [--categories]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--include-body {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--query-pack-name]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--resource-types]
                                                 [--solutions]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--tags]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query search -g resourceGroupName --query-pack-name queryPackName --categories network --resource-types microsoft.insights/autoscalesettings --solutions networkmonitoring --tags version="[v2021-12-01]"

az monitor log-analytics query-pack query search -g resourceGroupName --query-pack-name queryPackName --categories network --resource-types microsoft.insights/autoscalesettings --solutions networkmonitoring --tags version="[v2021-12-01]" --include-body false

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query show
commands.summary: Show a specific query defined within a log analytics query pack.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query show [--ids]
                                               [--name]
                                               [--query-pack-name]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--subscription]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query show --query-id 112c6b1f-5a86-4f01-a2d7-efb8e31f930f -g resourceGroup --query-pack-name queryPackName

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query update
commands.summary: Update a specific query within a log analytics query pack.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics query-pack query update [--add]
                                                 [--body]
                                                 [--categories]
                                                 [--description]
                                                 [--display-name]
                                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--query-pack-name]
                                                 [--remove]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--resource-types]
                                                 [--set]
                                                 [--solutions]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--tags]
examples: az monitor log-analytics query-pack query update --query-id 112c6b1f-5a86-4f01-a2d7-efb8e31f930f -g resourceGroup  --query-pack-name queryPackName --body "heartbeat | take 20" --categories [2]=databases --tags version[0]=null
